tuv.seg: Case Study 1: How income from work affects Jobseeker's Allowance
Cás-staidéar 1: Conas a bhíonn tionchar ag ioncam ón obair ar Liúntas do Lucht Cuardaigh Fostaíochta
This case study shows the affect of work on Jobseeker's Allowance in 2017
Léiríonn an cás-staidéar seo an tionchar atá ag an obair ar an Liúntas do Lucht Cuardaigh Fostaíochta ón 2017
John is living with his partner Mary and their two children
Tá John ina chónaí lena pháirtí Máire agus lena mbeirt leanaí
He recently lost his job as a barman but has managed to get some part-time work in a local restaurant
Chaill sé a phost mar fhear beáir le gairid ach d’éirigh leis obair pháirtaimseartha a fháil i mbialann áitiúil
He is working two days a week
Tá sé ag obair dhá lá sa tseachtain
His assessable earnings for social welfare purposes are €110 per week
Is ionann a thuilleamh inmheasúnaithe i leith leasa shóisialaigh agus €110 in aghaidh na seachtaine
(Assessable earnings are gross earnings less deductions for PRSI, superannuation and union dues.) His wife cares for her mother, who lives nearby, and is getting full-rate Carer's Allowance

(Is éard atá i dtuilleamh inmheasúnaithe ná an t-olltuilleamh lúide asbhaintí i leith ÁSPC, aoisliúntais agus dleachtanna ceardchumainn.) Tugann a bhean chéile aire dá máthair, atá ina cónaí in aice láimhe, agus faigheann sí an Liúntas Cúramóra ag an ráta iomlán
She is also getting Child Benefit for each of their two children
Faigheann sí Sochar Leanaí dá mbeirt leanaí freisin
John wants to go back to bar work and has applied to a number of local pubs and hotels
Tá John ag iarraidh dul ar ais ag obair i mbeár agus chuir sé isteach ar phoist i roinnt tithe tábhairne agus óstán áitiúil
He heard that he can get Jobseeker's Allowance (JA) for the days the he is not working and wants to know how much JA he is entitled to

Chuala sé gur féidir leis Liúntas do Lucht Cuardaigh Fostaíochta (LLCF) a fháil do na laethanta nach bhfuil sé ag obair agus teastaíonn uaidh a fháil amach cá mhéad LLCF a bhfuil sé i dteideal a fháil
Other than Mary's social welfare payments and John's part-time work they have no other income
Níl aon ioncam eile acu seachas na híocaíochtaí leasa shóisialaigh a fhaigheann Mary agus an obair pháirtaimseartha a dhéanann John
However, they have savings of €17,500
Ach, tá coigilteas €17,500 acu
He is entitled to JA only for periods of unemployment
Níl sé i dteideal an LLCF a fháil ach do thréimhsí dífhostaíochta amháin
The minimum period a person must be unemployed in order to receive JA is 4 days in a period of 7 consecutive days
Is é an íostréimhse go gcaithfidh duine a bheith dífhostaithe chun LLCF a fháil ná 4 lá i dtréimhse 7 lá leantacha
Jobseeker's Allowance rate (note 1) €222.80
Ráta an Liúntais do Lucht Cuardaigh Fostaíochta (nóta 1) €222.80
Less average weekly means (note 2) €21
Lúide meánacmhainní seachtainiúla (nóta 2) €21.00
Total Jobseeker's Allowance weekly rate €201.80
Ráta seachtainiúil an Liúntais Iomláin do Lucht Cuardaigh Fostaíochta €201.80
Calculate the maximum JA payment John would be entitled to if he didn’t have any means
Ríomh an uasíocaíocht LLCF uasta a bheadh John i dteideal a fháil mura mbeadh aon acmhainní aige
John’s maximum payment is €222.80
€222.80 atá in uasíocaíocht John
This is made up of his personal payment of €193 and €14.90 for each of his two children (John gets a half-rate Increase for a Child Dependant)
Is éard atá ann ná a íocaíocht phearsanta de €193 agus €14.90 dá bheirt leanaí. Faigheann John Méadú i leith Cleithiúnaí Linbh ar leathráta
His wife also gets a half-rate increase for child dependants with her Carer's Allowance payment
Faigheann a bhean chéile méadú leathráta i leith cleithiúnaithe linbh lena híocaíocht Liúntais Chúramóra chomh maith
He will not get an Increase for a Qualified Adult because his wife Mary is getting her own social welfare payment, full-rate Carer’s Allowance
Ní bhfaighidh sé Méadú le haghaidh Duine Aosaithe Cháilithe toisc go bhfuil a cuid íocaíochta leasa shóisialaigh féin, Liúntas Cúramóra ar ráta iomlán, á fáil ag a bhean chéile, Mary
(However, John could claim an Increase for a Qualified Adult if Mary agrees to getting half-rate Carer's Allowance. The family can check to see if this would be of greater benefit to them.)
(John in ann Méadú le haghaidh Duine Aosaithe Cháilithe a éileamh má tá Mary sásta Liúntas Cúramóra ar leathráta a fháil.)
John's average assessable weekly earnings are €110
Is é meántuilleamh inmheasúnaithe seachtainiúil John ná €110
First you must find out if John's weekly means disqualify him from getting JA
Ar dtús caithfidh tú a fháil amach an mbeadh John dícháilithe ó LLCF a fháil mar gheall ar a acmhainní seachtainiúla
€20 per day from casual work (up to a maximum of €60) will be deducted from his average assessable weekly earnings and then 60% of the balance will be assessed as his weekly means

Déanfar €20 in aghaidh an lae ó obair ócáideach (suas le huasmhéid €60) a asbhaint óna mheántuilleamh inmheasúnaithe seachtainiúil, agus ansin déanfar 60% den fhuílleach a mheasúnú mar a acmhainní seachtainiúla
€110 – €40 (don dá lá a oibríodh) = €70 x 60% = €42
John's weekly means from employment of €42 is less than the maximum amount he would be entitled to for his circumstances (€222.80)
Tá acmhainní seachtainiúla John ó fhostaíocht arb ionann iad agus €42 níos lú ná an t-uasmhéid a bheadh sé i dteideal a fháil ó thaobh a imthosca (€222.80)
Now you know he is entitled to a certain amount of Jobseeker's Allowance the next step is to calculate the actual amount of Jobseeker's Allowance he is entitled to

Tá a fhios agat anois go bhfuil sé i dteideal méid áirithe dá Liúntas do Lucht Cuardaigh Fostaíochta a choinneáil agus is é an chéad chéim eile ná méid iarbhír an Liúntais do Lucht Cuardaigh Fostaíochta atá sé i dteideal a fháil a ríomh
To do this you must calculate his 'assessable daily earning'
Caithfidh tú a‘thuilleamh laethúil inmheasúnaithe’ a ríomh chun é seo a dhéanamh
He is entitled to JA only for periods of unemployment
Níl sé i dteideal an LLCF a fháil ach do thréimhsí dífhostaíochta amháin
The minimum period a person must be unemployed in order to receive JA is 4 days in a period of 7 consecutive days
Is é an íostréimhse go gcaithfidh duine a bheith dífhostaithe chun LLCF a fháil ná 3 lá i dtréimhse 6 lá as a chéile
John has 4 consecutive days of unemployment
Tá 4 lá dífhostaíochta as a chéile ag John
He is employed for 2 days
Tá sé fostaithe dhá lá as sé lá
John's average assessable daily earnings are (€110 ÷ 2 days work) = €55
Is ionann meántuilleamh inmheasúnaithe laethúil John agus (€110 ÷ an dá lá a oibríodh) = €55
Less disregard for day worked €55 - €20 = €35
Lúide neamhaird don lá a oibríodh €55 - €20 = €35
60 % of his assessable daily earnings of €35 = €21
60 % dá thuilleamh inmheasúnaithe laethúil de €35= €21
Weekly means is €21 x 2 (number of days worked) = €42
Is ionann acmhainní seachtainiúla agus €21 x 2 (an líon laethanta a oibríodh) = €42
John's weekly means from employment is €42
Is iad na hacmhainní seachtainiúla ó fhostaíocht atá ag John ná €42
More information is available in our document How Jobseeker's Allowance is affected by income from employment and in our Worksheet on Jobseeker's Allowance and income from work

Is féidir tuilleadh eolais a fháil inár ndoiciméad Conas atá tionchar ag ioncam fostaíochta ar Liúntas do Lucht Cuardaigh Fostaíochta agus inár mBileog oibre ar Liúntas do Lucht Cuardaigh Fostaíochta agus ioncam ón obair
His savings are not taken into account because they are below the €20,000 threshold
Ní chuirtear a choigilteas san áireamh toisc go bhfuil siad faoin tairseach €20,000
More information is available in our document Capital and social welfare payments
Tá tuilleadh eolais ar fáil inár ndoiciméad Caipiteal agus íocaíochtaí leasa shóisialaigh
His wife's Carer's Allowance and Child Benefit are not taken into account in the assessment of means
Ní chuirtear Liúntas Cúramóra agus Sochar Leanaí a mhná céile san áireamh sa mheasúnú acmhainní
As she is getting her own social welfare personal payment (Carer's Allowance) he cannot claim a qualified adult increase for her
Toisc go bhfuil a híocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh féin aici (Liúntas Cúramóra) ní féidir leis méadú i leith duine aosaithe cháilithe a éileamh di
More information is available in our document Cash income and social welfare payments
Tá tuilleadh eolais ar fáil inár ndoiciméad Ioncam airgid agus íocaíochtaí leasa shóisialaigh
His means of €42 is halved because his wife is getting a social welfare payment
Déantar leath dá acmhainní de €42 toisc go bhfuil íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh á fáil ag a bhean chéile
More information is available in our document about the means test
Tá tuilleadh eolais le fáil inár ndoiciméad faoin tástáil mhaoine
Therefore, his total means is assessed as €21
Déantar a acmhainní iomlána a mheasúnú mar €21, dá bhrí sin
